articles.author: Clare Foran and Ali Zaslav, CNN
articles.title: Senate 'vote-a-rama' continues as Democrats eye finish line for sweeping climate and health care bill
articles.description: The Senate is continuing to work Sunday on a series of back-to-back amendment votes as Democrats hope to pass their sweeping health care and climate package.

articles.title: Senators from both sides discuss the Inflation Reduction Act - CNN Video
articles.description: Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-SC) and Sen. Richard Blumenthal (D-CT) participate in a joint bipartisan interview with CNN's Dana Bash and give their take on the massive health care and climate bill knows as the Inflation Reduction Act currently making its way throug…

articles.author: CNN staff
articles.title: READ: Inflation Reduction Act -- Democrats' sweeping climate and health care bill
articles.description: The Democratic-backed bill known as the Inflation Reduction Act would represent the largest climate investment in US history. It would also make major changes to health care policy and impose new taxes to pay for it. Read the bill:

articles.title: Watch Bernie Sanders criticize climate and health care bill on Senate floor - CNN Video
articles.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-VT) made his perspective on the Democrats' large climate and health care bill clear on the Senate floor, criticizing the legislation for not addressing inflation in a way he sees as beneficial to American workers.

articles.author: Opinion by Richard Galant, CNN
articles.title: Opinion: What started in Kansas upends American politics
articles.description: In "The Wizard of Oz," a tornado sends Dorothy spinning into the "Merry Old Land of Oz." Last week it was what Politico called a "political earthquake" in Kansas that sent the national debate over abortion into a new and unpredictable phase.
articles.content:

articles.author: Alisha Ebrahimji, CNN
articles.title: He was shot and killed playing the sport he loved. Now this Ohio 15-year-old is one of the country's latest victims of gun violence
articles.description: Ali Jeylani knows you shouldn't pick favorites when it comes to family members, but of his seven siblings, he's always had a soft spot for his younger brother, Issa.
articles.content: The United States is on pace to match or surpass its worst year on record for the number of gun violence related incidents, many of which don't draw major headlines. Through this Portraits of America… [+6912 chars]

articles.author: Nouran Salahieh and Elizabeth Wolfe, CNN
articles.title: More human remains discovered in Lake Mead's receding waters
articles.description: This is the fourth time human remains have been found at Lake Mead National Recreation Area since May.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Joe Biden's hugely consequential Covid isolation
articles.description: A fatigued, runny-nosed President Joe Biden entered Covid solitude on July 21 with his legislative agenda stalled, a standoff brewing with the House speaker and an unfinished plan to kill the world's top terrorist with a drone.
articles.content: Washington (CNN)A fatigued, runny-nosed President Joe Biden entered Covid solitude on July 21 with his legislative agenda stalled, a standoff brewing with the House speaker and an unfinished plan to … [+13988 chars]

articles.author: Tami Luhby and Ella Nilsen, CNN
articles.title: How the climate bill could save you money on electricity, cars and appliances
articles.description: Democrats' new climate bill contains a bevy of tax incentives aimed at pushing consumers, developers, small businesses and others towards clean energy.

articles.author: Opinion by Frida Ghitis
articles.title: Opinion: Biden is racking up wins but getting no love for it
articles.description: For a president who so many people believe is failing, Joe Biden sure is suddenly notching up an impressive string of victories, writes Frida Ghitis. Is it only a matter of time before Biden's polls catch up with the new wave of accomplishments?
